resources.string: Activity used for making tests with the Timber and ButterKnife libraries. \n \nCustom colors for the Logcat: Verbose - BBBBBB, Debug - 6897BB, Info - 6A8759, Warning - BBB529, Error - FF6B68, Assert - 9876AA.
Text field used for making tests with \n Android View Animations library.
